meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.4. The small red needle points precisely to the 0.04 mark on the circular dial. The dial's 0-9 scale (0.00-0.09) spans 360 degrees, so each step is 36 degrees. The needle is at 4 steps from 0.00, resulting in 144 degrees relative to the 0.00 mark.
